name: milkyway
description: Universe styles, as a semantic-ui theme

scripts.watch: cd semantic && gulp build && gulp watch
scripts.preversion: git add . && git stash && npm run clean
scripts.version: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Version $npm_package_version" && git push origin master && git checkout release && git merge origin master --no-edit --strategy-option theirs && cd semantic && gulp build && cd .. && git add --force dist semantic*.js semantic*.css
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git checkout master
scripts.storybook: cd semantic && gulp build && cd .. && start-storybook -p 6006 -s ./semantic/src/themes/universe/assets
scripts.sample: cd sample && npm install && npm start

author: uniiverse
